title: Single Of The Week: Craft Spells – After the Moment
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/craftspells.jpg "craftspells")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5904-single-of-the-week-craft-spells-after-the-moment/attachment/craftspells)

So I’m sitting in a pub overlooking London Fields sipping a cold pint and this record comes on the speakers; I couldn’t think of a more perfect set of sounds. Craft Spells have only been in our consciousness for a short while now, but they impress anyone who listens to them. With the summer just round the corner their LP could be a surprise soundtrack to many peoples summers. Check out one of the standouts from Idle Labor bellow.

 [After the Moment](http://soundcloud.com/craftspells/after-the-moment) by [CraftSpells](http://soundcloud.com/craftspells)
